# SparseTriangular

**Global Variable**

A triangular sparse matrix with a nonunit diagonal.

## Declaration

```swift
var SparseTriangular: SparseKind_t { get }
```

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/SparseTriangle_t] field indicates which triangle (upper or lower) represents the matrix.

## Constants

- **SparseOrdinary**: An unsymmetric sparse matrix without special structure.
- **SparseSymmetric**: A symmetric sparse matrix.
- **SparseUnitTriangular**: A triangular sparse matrix with a unit diagonal.
- **SparseHermitian**: A flag to describe the type of matrix represented.
